```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
billionaires <- read.csv("billionaires_dataset.csv")

billionaires
```

```{r}
billionaires %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  summarise(avg_gdp = mean(gdp_country)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(avg_gdp)) %>% 
  head(5)
```

```{r}
billionaires %>% 
  mutate(adjusted_final_worth = finalWorth/cpi_country) %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  summarise(avg_afw = mean(adjusted_final_worth)) %>% 
  ungroup()
```
